name: BNZSA API
description: Software to ingest data from another companies and provide it to BNZSA. Project implemented in Python with FastAPI and MySQL.

name: BNZSA ETL
description: Various process of extraction, transformation and load (ETL) using Python, PHP, MySQL, SQLServer, Airflow, Pandas

name: Battle Sim
description: Software to simulate war battles between armies. Project that links knowledge of AI, Simulation and DSL implementation.

name: ReTex
description: An information retrieval system based on Vectorial Model. Implemented in Python using Flask and VueJS.

name: DFU3dREC
description: Software to segment and reconstruct 3D models of diabetic foot ulcers using Intel Realsense Depth Camera.

name: Roar
description: A distributed social media based on Twitter. Project implemented in Python with FastAPI and AngularJS.
